amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to prohibit the enforcement of forced arbitration clauses in contracts covered by the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
